org.fusesource.jansi

Class Ansi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi

  • public class Ansi
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a fluent API for generating ANSI escape sequences.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hiram Chirino
